opened_date.description: The date on which the check was created

opened_time.description: The time of day that the check was created, in twelve hour format

item_description.description: A comma-separated list of the text descriptions of each item in the check

server.description: The name of the server who created the check

tax.description: The currency amount of tax payments applied to the check

tender.description: The method of payment for the check

check_id.description: The unique identifier for the check

check_num.description: The numeric identifier for the check

total.description: The total price of the check, in US dollars

table_size.description: The number of customers whose orders are part of the check

discount.description: The currency amount that the price of the check was reduced because of discounts

reason_of_discount.description: A description of the discount that was applied to the check

link.description: The URL of the check image

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer associated with the check

customer.description: The name of the customer associated with the check

customer_phone.description: The telephone number of the customer associated with the check

customer_email.description: The email address of the customer associated with the check

date.description: Date folder name from SFTP path
